verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥ח <WH5329> To the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <WH5068> offer freely מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> [or] Song אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> God יְחָנֵּ֥נוּ <WH2603> be merciful וִֽיבָרְכֵ֑נוּ <WH1288> unto us and bless יָ֤אֵ֥ר <WH215> to shine פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> us [and] cause his face אִתָּ֣נוּ <WH854> against סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> upon us Selah
לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> may be known בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> upon earth דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> That thy way בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> among all nations יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> thy saving health
יוֹד֖וּךָ <WH3034> praise עַמִּ֥ים ׀ <WH5971> Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <WH3034> praise עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all

יִֽשְׂמְח֥וּ <WH8055> be glad וִֽירַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> and sing for joy לְאֻ֫מִּ֥ים <WH3816> O let the nations כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> for thou shalt judge עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> the people מִישׁ֑וֹר <WH4334> righteously וּלְאֻמִּ֓ים ׀ <WH3816> the nations בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon earth תַּנְחֵ֣ם <WH5148> and govern סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah
יוֹד֖וּךָ <WH3034> praise עַמִּ֥ים ׀ <WH5971> Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <WH3034> praise עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> all
אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> [Then] shall the earth נָתְנָ֣ה <WH5414> yield יְבוּלָ֑הּ <WH2981> her increase יְ֝בָרְכֵ֗נוּ <WH1288> shall bless אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> [and] God אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> [even] our own God
יְבָרְכֵ֥נוּ <WH1288> shall bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> God וְיִֽירְא֥וּ <WH3372> shall fear אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> us and all the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth
